long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get access to the world’s most accurate global B2B data

Find the most accurate and up-to-date emails and mobile phone numbers of decision makers from all around the world, together with rich company data, directly in your chrome browser.


👨‍💼🏢 Find Contact and Company Data
Lusha extension goes beyond contact data, it provides you with comprehensive knowledge and insights into prospects and companies you're looking for, including:
1. Job changes
2. Buyer intent signals
3. Fundings
4. Revenue
5. Industry and specialties 
6. Company employees and more! 

🆓 Free to use
Unlock prospecting power from the get-go with Lusha’s free tier and get free credits to use across Lusha platform and extension, no credit card required.

🔑 Extension Key Features

- Enrich Data in Bulk: Quickly reveal and collect multiple contact details.
- Save to a List: Organize your prospects for seamless follow-up.
- Export to Your CRM: Sync your contacts instantly with your favorite CRM.
- Add to an Email Sequence: Launch personalized outreach with Lusha Engage.


💻 Use it Everywhere
Lusha’s extension simplifies your prospecting, ABM and ABS efforts, giving you instant access to decision-makers, wherever you work so you can stay productive and focus on closing deals:

- On LinkedIn and Sales Navigator: Quickly discover verified emails, and phone numbers directly on decision-makers' profiles 
- On Company Websites: Instantly uncover decision-makers within the company and access their contact information.
- In Gmail and Google Calendar: Learn more and enrich data of prospects you have connected via email or booked meetings with.
- In Your CRM: Enrich and update the data of existing contacts and leads, ensuring your CRM is always accurate and actionable.

💘 Here’s what our customers say:

👩🏾‍💼 “Lusha is highly accurate, so I don’t need anything else, really.” - Catherine Gomis, SDR at Anaplan
👩🏻‍💼 “Lusha is the easiest way to find B2B contact information with just one click.” - Ines Ennaji, Head of Global Development at MONOGRAM PARIS
👨🏻‍💼 “The hardest part of my job is cold calling and getting in touch with the right people. Now with Lusha, I have a way in.” - Thayer Selleck, Account Manager at Insight Global
